name: SCH3U Storyboard
description:
I found this old PC in my garage. It seems to be running some sort of.. beta version of Windows 95. It's also got some sort of storyboard software running on it too, might be worth looking into.

This was created in the Godot game engine. All code except for shader code is our own, and this is brand-new code, not borrowed from any past projects.

Code was written mostly by James Huynh 

Graphics and story written and made by Sion Gang, Daniel Ye, and James Huynh

Recycle Bin removes effects, Storyboard Data folder allows you to switch between scenes.
